lines.text:
[off screen]
No sir, folks, you don't have to exercise to get in condition. You don't have to move a muscle, folks. Just a few of our pills and a man like this will look like this. Who wants to buy some? They contain vita-mines A, B, C, D, X, Y and Z!

[reading from a book, as Heckle follows his instructions]
How to tenderize one tough bulldog. Knead thoroughly, working with both hands back and forth. Then add a dash of liniment, six reducing pills, and sprinkle with talcum powder. Then turn over gently and roll out until a nice, gooey consistency. Then place in a hot steam-box and bake until well done.
I say, we're safe! It's the end of the picture!

[pulls the magpies off screen]
Not yet it ain't!
Ow! Ouch! It hurts! I give up!
